summary: My first mod, at the moment it only has two weapons but this should be updated daily.
descriptionHtml:
This is my very first mod, i am almost completely new to Creation kit and also skyrim, I\'ve actually never even finished skyrim yet XD


NOTE: I will no longer be updating this mod, feel free to use it at your will, and i dont mind you creating your own mod with these, have fun and stay safe


Last Update:
- Katana

What was included in the V0.3 Update:
- Custom loot chest texture
- Long Hammer


What was included in the V0.2 Update:
- Great Lion Shield!
- Added Sound effect for the bow!



What was included in the v0.1 Update:
- Should now be able to craft the weapons.
- Should now be able to upgrade them with the grindstone


the current things about the mod:
- The Stats of the weapon will be changed in the future, Damage also and weight, etc
- Currently you cannot use a grindstone on to improve them, will also be added in the future if possible.
- Currently you cannot forge these weapon, but you will be able to in the future,
- i am not sure but i dont think the are enchantable if they are please leave a comment telling me so!
author: Foostic
